title: Collapse of key Atlantic current could bring extreme drought to Europe for hundreds of years, study finds
description: Scientists modeled Europe's future if a key Atlantic current were to collapse and found that the continent faces a much drier future.
content: Southern Europe's already scorching dry summers could get even worse over the next 1,000 years if a key ocean current system collapses — with a rise in extreme droughts and longer dry seasons, a new … [+5641 chars]
